entry.title: WIND WARNING , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ingonish Beach 2:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 44 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
